Description: Deterministic + probabilistic ER with explainable scorecards, reversible merges, and human adjudication queues. Repo: services/entity-resolution/. Canonical JSON-LD facets consistent with graph model.
Acceptance Criteria: Canonical JSON-LD facets consistent with graph model. Every merge has an override log (user, reason, time). Zero shared schema edits; GraphQL exposed via stitched schema adapter.
OpenAPI spec finalized; request/response schemas documented; versioning strategy defined.

Description: Implement candidate generation using rules + embeddings hook.
Acceptance Criteria: Rules produce candidates; embeddings hook callable; candidates ranked by similarity.

Description: Implement scoring with configurable thresholds; emit er.merge.v1 events.
Acceptance Criteria: Scores computed correctly; threshold configurable; events emitted on merge decisions.

Summary: ER-4: Merge graph and reversible operations
Description: Implement merge graph with fully reversible operations and complete audit trail.
Acceptance Criteria: Merges recorded in graph; /er/split restores pre-merge state losslessly; audit trail complete.

Description: Implement /er/explain returning feature vectors and rationale.
Acceptance Criteria: Explain returns features, weights, and policy label. Human-readable rationale.

Description: Implement adjudication queue API for human review (no UI).
Acceptance Criteria: Borderline cases routed to queue; queue items retrievable via API; decisions recorded.

Summary: ER-7: Golden datasets and reproducible merges
Description: Create golden datasets; ensure reproducible merge outcomes.
Acceptance Criteria: Golden datasets cover edge cases; merges are deterministic on same input.
